changes.change: Big changes for 1.0 !
This API version match with game version 1.9
Changelogs page on the website
/weapon_info endpoint.
/trait_info endpoint.
/version or /v endpoint. Return API version and game version API using.
/traitinfo endpoint. Like the old one but up to date and with more information.
/traits endpoint. Add missing traits.
/ammo endpoint. Return all ammo from the game. Easy parse with enpoint bellow
/ammo/:ammoId endpoint. Return only information for ammo with ID define in URL.
/weapons endpoint. Add missing weapons.
/weaponinfo endpoint. Like the old one but up to date and with more information.
/legendary_skin endpoint. Return all legendary skin from the game. Easy parse with enpoint bellow
/legendary_skin/:legendaryId endpoint. Return only information for legendary skin with ID define in URL.
/tools endpoint. Get list of all tools in the game.
/toolinfo endpoint. Tool information. Like other endpoints you can use queries for parsing specific info.
/consumables endpoint. Get list of all consumables in the game.
/consumableinfo endpoint. Consumable information. Like other endpoints you can use queries for parsing specific info.
/damagetype endpoint. Return all damage type from the game. Easy parse with enpoint bellow
/damagetype/:damageId endpoint. Return only information for damage type with ID define in URL.
/hunters endpoint. Get list of all hunters in the game.
/hunterinfo endpoint. Hunter information. Like other endpoints you can use queries for parsing specific info.
/dlc endpoint. Return all DLC from the game. Easy parse with enpoint bellow
/dlc/:dlcId endpoint. Return only information for DLC with ID define in URL. (ID of DLCs are SteamId)
Rework the entire API for a more optimal and simple use.
Host images on https://huntshowdown.dearvoodoo.com
Upload images on Github
